title: "Drop Debt Gorgeous."
description: President Biden indicates he is considering student debt relief while Joe Manchin continues to block the rest of the Democratic agenda in the name of bipartisanship, Tucker Carlson and Matt Gaetz turn on Kevin McCarthy after the latest round of leaked tapes, and Hot Take hosts Mary Anna誰se Heglar and Amy Westervelt join for a special climate edition of Take Appreciator.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
